name: I need a date now!
description:
Erikhas revenge (Windows, MAC, Online)
(Download game for better experience.)

Erikha came home from work to see, that her ex-boyfriend who cheated on her invited her to his birthday party.

Is she going to flake? Girl No!! She will turn up. And with a better man! Will she?

Music:

GT-K Unity Technologies Japan/UCL

Where to play?:

Firefox

Mobile device (Please change your settings to desktop version and use the horizontal view."

Wo kann man es spielen?:

Firefox

und Handy Internetbrowser (bei Einstellungen "Desktop Version" wählen und das Handy in Portrait style lassen.)
